recipe.title: Meatloaf
ingredients: 2 lb meatloaf mix (beef, pork, and veal)
instructions: Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 350°F. Mix together all ingredients except chili sauce using your hands. Transfer mixture to a 13- by 9-inch glass baking dish and mound into a 10- by 5-inch oval loaf. Spread chili sauce over meatloaf and bake 1 hour.
